sources.title: 1936 Maria Die Magd ( Hilde Körber, Alfred Abel, Hilde Hildebrand)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1936. Maria die Magd.  U.a mit Hilde Körber und Hilde Hildebrand

metadata.Plot: An actress and her lawyer husband are so busy that their maid becomes the real mother to their six year old boy and at one point causes consternation by taking the child away to her home village.
metadata.Writer: Walter Harlan, Axel Eggebrecht, Veit Harlan
metadata.Actors: Hilde Körber, Hilde Hildebrand, Alfred Abel
